title: God Exiles Adam and Eve from the Garden
description:
Readings from:

Genesis 3:17-24

1 Corinthians 15:22

Today's passages were read by K.A Ellis, director of the Edmiston Center for the Study of the Bible and Ethnicity in Atlanta, where leaders and laypeople alike study Christian Perseverance.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
